title: Bug Please Fix
body: if a person Disconnects before the 15 min mark and then you try to surrender the surrender vote comes up and only 4 people can vote (because someone disconnected) but when all four people say yes it doesn't surrender (because you need all 5 people to surrender but one is afk) is this a bug or what?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like you've stumbled upon a bug, you should definitely make a thread over on the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board, please be sure to read the "[How to report a Game Bug](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug)" thread before posting to ensure you provide enough details.
